channel.title: [help] With global item spawn
channel.description:
Hello all
I added the method to spawn globalitem on some locations but it cannot find a symbol please can someone help me? Please help me ...
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2wdpvgo.png[/img]
Thanks for help .. :)

Make sure the method to add items is called addGlobalItems

item.title: [help] With global item spawn
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Try this:

public void RandomItem(Client c) { int items[] = {1050, 1048, 1046,1044,1042,1040}; int location [][] = {{3236,3173},{3148,3508},{2999, 3356},{2987,3408}}; int wichItem = Misc.random(items.length-1); String name[] = {"Lumbridge swamp", "Edgville bridge", "Skilling area","Falador"}; int where = Misc.random(location.length-1); Server.itemHandler.addGlobalItem(items[wichItem], location[where][0], location[where][1], 1); c.sM("[@blu@Server Item Spawn@bla@]@or2@ A " + getItemName(items[wichItem]) + " has spawned near the "+ name[where] +"."); }
All I did was add “Server.” in front of itemHandler.

Read full topic

item.title: [help] With global item spawn
item.dc:creator: @Cesko_Bro Cesko Bro
item.description:
@Cesko_Bro wrote:

public void RandomItem(Client c) {
int items[] = {1050, 1048, 1046,1044,1042,1040};
int location [][] = {{3236,3173},{3148,3508},{2999, 3356},{2987,3408}};
int wichItem = Misc.random(items.length-1);
String name[] = {“Lumbridge swamp”, “Edgville bridge”, “Skilling area”,“Falador”};
int where = Misc.random(location.length-1);
itemHandler.addGlobalItem(items[wichItem], location[where][0], location[where][1], 1);
c.sM("[@blu@Server Item Spawn@bla@]@or2@ A " + getItemName(items[wichItem]) + " has spawned near the “+ name[where] +”.");
}

Read full topic

item.title: [help] With global item spawn
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It can’t find the variable “c” of Client (just meaning it’s a Client object).
You either need to declare it, or make it visible for that method.
Can’t say what, exactly, as I don’t know your code.

Read full topic
